subject: World War II (1939-45)
Soccer
Holocaust and the Nazi Era
Defense and Military Forces
lead_paragraph: During the German occupation of Ukraine, which began in August 1942, a group of Ukrainian soccer players defeated a military team of Germans. The story begins after the match.
